titles.title: A bill to restore the rule that agreements between manufacturers and retailers, distributors, or wholesalers to set the minimum price below which the manufacturer's product or service cannot be sold violates the Sherman Act.
Discount Pricing Consumer Protection Act
Discount Pricing Consumer Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Discount Pricing Consumer Protection Act - Amends the Sherman Act to declare that any contract, combination, conspiracy, or agreement setting a minimum price below which a product or service cannot be sold by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor violates the Act.
